symptoms.name: Retrobulbar neuritis symptoms (likely to overlap with meningococcal meningitis symptoms)
symptoms.severity: Variable, can range from mild to severe

physical_findings: Optic neuritis findings (visual loss, pain with eye movement)

lab_values.CSF analysis: Elevated white blood cell count, elevated protein, decreased glucose, presence of bacteria

required: Clinical presentation consistent with meningococcal meningitis and retrobulbar neuritis
Positive CSF analysis showing evidence of meningococcal infection
supportive: Imaging findings suggestive of optic neuritis
